actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-822.

official_title: Resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs for routine purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the Ninety-third Congress, $25,000 in addition to the amount, and for the same purposes, specified in the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946, and in S. Res. 96, S. Res. 137, and S. Res. 178, 93d Congress.

titles.title: Resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs for routine purposes.
